text: Joshua Lowey (born December 16, 1984) is an American professional baseball pitcher for the Acereros de Monclova of the Mexican Baseball League. ==Career== Lowey worked his way up through the independent-A Frontier League, American Association and Atlantic League and has pitched parts of the last four seasons for the Acereros de Monclova of the Mexican League through 2018. During that time, he has racked up 55 victories and maintained a 2.97 ERA, getting selected to 3 All-Star games and winning the Pitcher of the Year award in 2015 and 2018. Due to his success on the mound, he's become a fan favorite in Monclova, earning the nickname El Alcalde, or 'The Mayor' in English. Lowey signed with the KT Wiz of the KBO League for the second half of the 2016 season.http://www.nwfdailynews.com/sports/20160708/fwb-alumnus-josh-lowey- dominates-mexican-league-signs-with-koreas-kt-wiz ==References== ==External links== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Acereros de Monclova players Category:American expatriate baseball players in Mexico Category:American expatriate baseball players in South Korea Category:Baseball players from Florida Category:KBO League pitchers Category:KT Wiz players Category:Mexican League baseball pitchers Category:Navegantes del Magallanes players Category:People from Fort Walton Beach, Florida Category:River City Rascals players Category:Somerset Patriots players Category:Tomateros de Culiacán players Category:Wichita Wingnuts players Category:Windy City ThunderBolts players
title: Josh Lowey
